apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple with heart emoji beautifully illustrates a loving connection between two men, one with dark skin tone and the other with medium-light skin tone, joined by a bright red heart.  Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and soft rounded edges lend a tangible, affectionate feel to their embrace, while realistic lighting accentuates their bond. It's a powerful representation of romantic partnership and love in its many forms, perfect for celebrating relationships on Apple devices.
